mapper.select: SELECT substring(board_content_code, 20) as boardNumber ,board_content_code ,b.board_name ,m_member_id ,board_content_title ,board_content_content ,board_content_date FROM t_board_content bc INNER JOIN t_board b ON bc.board_code = b.board_code ORDER BY bc.board_content_date DESC

SELECT bc.board_content_code ,b.board_name ,bc.m_member_id ,bc.board_content_title ,bc.board_content_content ,bc.board_content_date FROM t_board_content bc INNER JOIN t_board b ON bc.board_code = b.board_code WHERE bc.board_content_code = #{boardContentCode}

SELECT board_reply_code AS boardReplyCode ,board_content_code AS boardContentCode ,board_reply_content AS boardReplyContent ,board_reply_date As boardReplyDate FROM t_board_reply WHERE board_content_code = #{boardContentCode}
SELECT board_code as boardCode, board_name as boardName FROM t_board ORDER BY board_date DESC
select max(CAST(substring(board_content_code, 20) AS DECIMAL)) as maxcol from t_board_content
select max(CAST(substring(board_code, 12) AS DECIMAL)) as maxcol from t_board
select max(CAST(substring(board_reply_code, 18) AS DECIMAL)) as maxcol from t_board_reply
